headline: Arista Networks (ANET) Names Todd Nightingale as New President and Chief Operating Officer
summary: Arista Networks Inc (NYSE:ANET) is one of the 11 must-buy AI stocks analysts are betting on. On June 16, the company announced the appointment of Todd Nightingale as its President and Chief Operating Officer, effective July 1, 2025. Nightingale brings extensive industry experience, having served as CEO of Fastly and held key leadership roles at […]

headline: Buy 5 AI Laggards of Past Month to Tap Solid Upside in the Short Term
summary: AI stocks like ANET, HUBS, TWLO, ADBE, and OKTA provided negative returns last month but now offer strong short-term upside potential.
